metadata.description: Test queries for focus group retrieval evaluation

queries.query: What did voters in Ohio 2024 say about the economy?
queries.notes: Rachel's explicit test query #1 - should return economy-related quotes from all 3 Ohio focus groups

queries.query: Show me moments where voters expressed distrust in institutions they used to support.
queries.notes: Rachel's explicit test query #2 - tests semantic matching, not just keywords

queries.query: What did voters in Texas say about immigration?
queries.notes: Texas is not in the corpus

queries.query: What happened in the 2020 Ohio Senate race?
What did voters say about cryptocurrency?
queries.notes: Cryptocurrency not discussed in any focus group

queries.query: What should the Ohio 2026 candidate do differently?
queries.notes: V2 query - requires synthesis, not just quote retrieval

queries.query: Summarize all the focus groups.
queries.notes: V2 query - requires synthesis across all groups

queries.query: What patterns do we see across races we lost?
Who won the Ohio 2024 Senate race?
What did voters in Columbus think about climate change?
queries.notes: Climate change not a prominent topic in Columbus focus group

queries.query: Compare the messaging that worked in Michigan vs Wisconsin.
What did voters say about the candidate's spouse?
What did Youngstown voters say about Democrats?
queries.notes: Location + topic - should return quotes about Democratic party from Youngstown FG

queries.query: How did union workers feel about Brennan?
queries.notes: Demographic + candidate - union workers' views on incumbent

queries.query: What did voters say about the Lordstown plant closure?
queries.notes: Specific event - GM Lordstown closure was major topic

queries.query: Show me quotes about feeling abandoned by the party.
queries.notes: Semantic - should match 'Democrats had decades to help us'

queries.query: What did working-class voters say about the economy?
What did Cleveland suburban voters think about Tim Brennan?
queries.notes: Location + candidate - Cleveland suburbs on incumbent

queries.query: What concerns did Ohio voters express about inflation?
queries.notes: Topic retrieval - inflation/cost of living across all Ohio FGs

queries.query: What did voters say about Jim Stanton?
queries.notes: Candidate retrieval - views on Republican challenger

queries.query: Show me quotes about Trump from Ohio voters.
queries.notes: Topic retrieval - Trump coattails were discussed

queries.query: What did Columbus educated voters say about the economy?
queries.notes: Location + topic - Columbus focus group on economy

queries.query: How did voters feel about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Absolutely. His tax cuts went to the rich. Working people got nothing....

queries.query: What did voters say about Tim Brennan?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Brennan. Young professionals need Democrats....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about Tim Brennan?
queries.expected_content_snippet: That's how Tim survives. Split-ticket voters....

queries.query: How did voters feel about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Fair or not, it's real. And it shows up at the ballot box....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: This is the problem. His attacks are visceral; our defense is wonky....

queries.query: How did voters feel about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: His record on reproductive rights is excellent. That's essential right now....

queries.query: How did voters feel about manufacturing jobs?
queries.expected_content_snippet: You want the truth? It's dying. When GM closed Lordstown, it took the soul of this place with it....

queries.query: What did voters say about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: I don't know either of them really. They all make promises....

queries.query: Show me quotes about their concerns.
queries.expected_content_snippet: He's not a politician. I like that. The politicians haven't fixed anything....

queries.query: How did voters feel about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: He opposes basically everything that would improve healthcare access....

queries.query: What did Educated voters think about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Good but technical. "Billions in investments" is abstract for regular people....

queries.query: What did voters say about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: [Bitterly] He's not wrong. 18 years. What's different? Nothing....

queries.query: Show me quotes about their concerns.
queries.expected_content_snippet: Our schools have resources that most Ohio districts can only dream of....

queries.query: Show me quotes about the Democratic party.
queries.expected_content_snippet: Law and order. Democrats seem soft on crime....

queries.query: How did voters feel about Tim Brennan?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Can he actually win this time? The state has shifted. He might be an anachronism....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: He's a businessman. Self-made. Owns car dealerships across Western Ohio. That's real....

queries.query: What did Class voters think about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Fire the politicians. Yes....

queries.query: What did Suburbs voters think about inflation and prices?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Cutting taxes doesn't help when I can't afford healthcare....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Needs human element. Who got hired? What changed?...

queries.query: How did voters feel about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: His healthcare positions would hurt patients. Gutting ACA, no alternatives....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about the economy?
queries.expected_content_snippet: The hospital systems here are enormous employers. Healthcare economy is strong....

queries.query: What did Educated voters think about their concerns?
Show me quotes about Tim Brennan.
queries.expected_content_snippet: Columbus alone cannot elect Brennan. He needs Cleveland, he needs some rural votes. That's getting h...

queries.query: What did Suburbs voters think about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: He fights for public education. That matters to me....

queries.query: Show me quotes about their concerns.
queries.expected_content_snippet: Decline. That's the word. Decline for 40 years....

queries.query: What concerns did voters express about Tim Brennan?
queries.expected_content_snippet: Stanton. Time for something different....

queries.query: Show me quotes about their concerns.
queries.expected_content_snippet: I see patients from rural Ohio. The health disparities are shocking....

queries.query: How did voters feel about manufacturing jobs?
queries.expected_content_snippet: The auto bailout saved union bosses, not workers. Plants still closed....

queries.query: What did Class voters think about their concerns?
queries.expected_content_snippet: They come before elections, shake hands, disappear. Every single one....

queries.query: Show me quotes about the Democratic party.
queries.expected_content_snippet: Brennan. I'm a Democrat, always will be....
